Caption: Dr. A. Ramachandran (Director) confers a Ph. D in Chemistry to Dr. D. Venkappayya
Description: At the sixth convocation a total of 470 degrees and diplomas (321 B. Tech., 76 M. Tech., 30 M. Sc., 19 Ph. D. and 24 D. I. I. T.) were granted. In the image, the Instituteâ€™s Director, Dr. A. Ramachandran confers Dr. D. Venkappayya his Ph. D. in Chemistry. Dr. D. Venkappayya began his career in teaching chemistry in the year 1975. He is the former dean and head of the department of chemistry, NIT, Tiruchirapalli. Over his career he has guided several doctoral candidates and has published about 60 research papers in international journals. He has also co-authored two textbooks on Engineering Chemistry. He is presently (2020) the Head of the Department of chemistry and Dean of Examinations, SASTRA University, Thanjavur.
